meanings.sent1: The blotty painting had colorful spots all over it.
meanings.sent2: Her blotty dress had stains that she couldn't remove.
meanings.sent3: The blotty cat walked around with paint marks on its fur.
meanings.sent4: The blotty sky was filled with dark clouds.
meanings.sent5: The blotty paper was covered in ink blots and smudges.

meanings.sent1: She noticed a blotty on her clean white shirt.
meanings.sent2: The blotty on the wall was from a spilled drink.
meanings.sent3: He found a blotty on his homework and tried to erase it.
meanings.sent4: The blotty on the map marked the location of the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The blotty on the mirror was a reminder of the messy breakfast.
